products.name: Lenovo 530 Full Size Wireless Computer Mouse for PC, Laptop, Computer with Windows - 2.4 GHz Nano USB Receiver - Ambidextrous Design - 12 Months Battery Life - Graphite Grey
products.description: Reliable Wireless Connectivity: The Lenovo 530 Wireless Mouse offers a dependable connection no matter where you are. Its advanced nano USB receiver utilizes robust 2.4 GHz wireless technology, ensuring seamless performance without the hassle of cords. Stay productive and focused without the constraints of wired setups.     Precision Tracking at Your Fingertips: Elevate your user experience with the 1200 DPI resolution optical sensor featured in this wireless mouse. Experience responsive and clear tracking that enhances your navigation, whether you're browsing the web, creating presentations, or engaging in detailed design work. Precision is now at your fingertips.     Durability That Lasts: With the Lenovo 530 Wireless Mouse, longevity is a guarantee. Boasting a remarkable lifespan of up to 8 million clicks for both left and right buttons, this mouse is built to withstand the rigors of daily use. Enjoy reliable performance for years to come, making it an ideal companion for your computing tasks.     Ergonomic Comfort for Extended Use: Experience unparalleled comfort during long work sessions with the unique and contoured design of the Lenovo 530 Wireless Mouse. Crafted for maximum ergonomics, this mouse fits perfectly in your hand, ensuring all-day comfort. The durable soft touch finish adds a premium feel to your interactions, making productivity a breeze.     Versatility and Portability: Whether you're left-handed or right-handed, the Lenovo 530 Wireless Mouse accommodates your preference. Its ambidextrous design ensures functionality and comfort for all users. Weighing just 65g (2.29 oz), it's the ultimate travel companion. Slip it into your laptop bag or pocket and enjoy its lightweight portability wherever you go. Plus, with an impressive battery life of up to 12 months (actual duration may vary based on usage), you can confidently use it without worrying about frequent recharges. Choose the Lenovo 530 Wireless Mouse for unparalleled performance, comfort, and convenience.
